```{r}
librarian::shelf(
  dplyr, DT, glue, readr)

read_csv("data/roster.csv") %>% 
  mutate(
    user      = glue("<a href='https://github.com/{github_username}'>@{github_username}</a>"),
    exercises = glue("<a href='{exercises_website}'>{basename(exercises_website)}</a>")) %>% 
  select(user, name = full_name, exercises) %>% 
  datatable(escape=F)
```
